text: Manon Lescaut is an Italian opera in four acts by Giacomo Puccini, first performed in Turin, on February 1, 1893, libretto by Luigi Illica, Giuseppe Giacosa, Giulio Ricordi, Marco Praga and Domenico Oliva. Puccini's third opera and the work that established his reputation. ==Principal roles== * Manon - soprano * des Grieux - tenor * Lescaut - baritone * Geronte - bass * Edmondo - tenor ==Reference== *The Complete Dictionary of Opera & Operetta, James Anderson, Wings Books, 1993. Category:1890s operas
title: Manon Lescaut
